portfolioContents.artName: Thank you for taking the time to enjoy my portfolio!
portfolioContents.artCaption: I hope you enjoy browsing my work.
I designed this logo for D. Vega Consulting to capture the blossoming, vibrant nature of their goal to serve the community.
I made this graphic as a part of an introductory post for a client. The graphic features their favorite color, purple.
